section.heading: Limitations on expenditures.
section.text: No more than $400,000 in Fiscal Year 2016 and $350,000 in each fiscal year thereafter shall be used by the Mayor to implement the Urban Farming Land Lease Program established pursuant to § 48-402.01 and to administer the real property tax abatement for certain urban farms established pursuant to§ 47-868, and the tax-exempt status conferred by § 47-1005(c).

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 6182 of the Fiscal Year 2016 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2015 (D.C. Act 21-127, July 27, 2015, 62 DCR 10201).
